PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Absorb
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Acrobatics
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Stronger when the user does not have a held item.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: After You
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Gives target priority in the next turn.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Ancient Power
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: May raise all user's stats at once.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Aqua Ring
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Restores a little HP each turn.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Aromatherapy
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Cures all status problems in your party.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Assist
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: In a Double Battle, user randomly attacks with a partner's move.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Assurance
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Power doubles if opponent already took damage in the same turn.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Attract
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: If opponent is the opposite gender, it's less likely to attack.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Autotomize
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Halves weight and sharply raises Speed.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Avalanche
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Power doubles if user took damage first.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Baby-Doll Eyes
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Always goes first. Lowers the target's attack.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Baton Pass
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User switches out and gives stat changes to the incoming Pokémon.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Beat Up
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Each Pokémon in your party attacks.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Belch
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User must have consumed a Berry.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Belly Drum
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User loses 50% of its max HP, but Attack raises to maximum.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Bestow
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Gives the user's held item to the target.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Bide
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User takes damage for two turns then strikes back double.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Bind
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Blaze Kick
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: High critical hit ratio. May burn opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Bounce
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Springs up on first turn, attacks on second. May paralyze opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Brick Break
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Breaks through Reflect and Light Screen barriers.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Brine
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Power doubles if opponent's HP is less than 50%.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Bug Bite
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Receives the effect from the opponent's held berry.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Calm Mind
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Raises user's Special Attack and Special Defense.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Camouflage
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Changes user's type according to the location.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Captivate
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Sharply lowers opponent's Special Attack if opposite gender.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Celebrate
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day. No battle effect.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Charge
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Raises user's Special Defense and next Electric move's power increases.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Circle Throw
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Clamp
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Clear Smog
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Removes all of the target's stat changes.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Close Combat
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Lowers user's Defense and Special Defense.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Coil
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Raises user's Attack, Defense and Accuracy.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Constrict
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: May lower opponent's Speed by one stage.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Conversion
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Changes user's type to that of its first move.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Conversion 2
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User changes type to become resistant to opponent's last move.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Cosmic Power
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Raises user's Defense and Special Defense.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Counter
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: When hit by a Physical Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Covet
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Opponent's item is stolen by the user.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Crafty Shield
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Protects the Pokémon from status moves.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Cross Poison
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: High critical hit ratio. May poison opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Crush Grip
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: More powerful when opponent has higher HP.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Curse
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Ghosts lose 50% of max HP and curse the opponent; Non-Ghosts raise Attack, Defense and lower Speed.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Dark Void
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Puts all adjacent opponents to sleep.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Defend Order
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Raises user's Defense and Special Defense.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Defog
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Lowers opponent's Evasiveness and clears fog.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Destiny Bond
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: If the user faints, the opponent also faints.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Detect
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Opponent's attack doesn't affect you, but may fail if used often.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Dig
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Digs underground on first turn, attacks on second. Can also escape from caves.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Disable
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Opponent can't use its last attack for a few turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Dive
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Dives underwater on first turn, attacks on second turn.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Dragon Ascent
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Lowers user's Defense and Special Defense.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Dragon Tail
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Drain Punch
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Draining Kiss
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User recovers most the HP inflicted on opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Dream Eater
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on a sleeping opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Earthquake
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Power is doubled if opponent is underground from using Dig.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Electric Terrain
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Prevents all Pokémon from falling asleep for 5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Electrify
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Changes the target's move to Electric type.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Electro Ball
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The faster the user, the stronger the attack.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Encore
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Forces opponent to keep using its last move for 3 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Endeavor
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Reduces opponent's HP to same as user's.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Endure
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Always left with at least 1 HP, but may fail if used consecutively.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Entrainment
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Makes target's ability same as user's.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Eruption
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Stronger when the user's HP is higher.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Facade
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Power doubles if user is burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Fairy Lock
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Prevents fleeing in the next turn.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Fake Out
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User attacks first, foe flinches. Only usable on first turn.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: False Swipe
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Always leaves opponent with at least 1 HP.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Feint
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Only hits if opponent uses Protect or Detect in the same turn.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Fell Stinger
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Sharply raises user's Attack if target is KO'd.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Final Gambit
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user's remaining HP. User faints.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Fire Fang
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: May cause flinching and/or burn opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Fire Pledge
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Added effects appear if combined with Grass Pledge or Water Pledge.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Fire Spin
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Flail
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Flare Blitz
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User receives recoil damage. May burn opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Flatter
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Confuses opponent, but raises its Special Attack by two stages.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Flower Shield
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Sharply raises Defense of all Grass-type Pokémon on the field.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Fly
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Flies up on first turn, attacks on second turn.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Flying Press
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Deals Fighting and Flying type damage.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Focus Punch
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: If the user is hit before attacking, it flinches instead.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Follow Me
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: In Double Battle, the user takes all the attacks.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Foresight
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, Normal-type and Fighting-type attacks can now hit Ghosts, and Ghost-type attacks hit Normal.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Freeze Shock
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May paralyze opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Freeze-Dry
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: May freeze opponent. Super-effective against Water types.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Frost Breath
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Always results in a critical hit.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Fusion Bolt
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Power increases if Fusion Flare is used in the same turn.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Fusion Flare
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Power increases if Fusion Bolt is used in the same turn.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Gastro Acid
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Cancels out the effect of the opponent's Ability.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Geomancy
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Charges on first turn, sharply raises user's Sp. Attack, Sp. Defense and Speed on the second.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Giga Drain
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Grass Knot
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The heavier the opponent, the stronger the attack.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Grass Pledge
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Added effects appear if preceded by Water Pledge or succeeded by Fire Pledge.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Grassy Terrain
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Restores a little HP of all Pokémon for 5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Gravity
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Prevents moves like Fly and Bounce and the Ability Levitate for 5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Growth
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Grudge
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: If the users faints after using this move, the PP for the opponent's last move is depleted.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Guard Split
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Guard Swap
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User and opponent swap Defense and Special Defense.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Gust
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce with double power.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Gyro Ball
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The slower the user, the stronger the attack.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Hail
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Non-Ice types are damaged for 5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Happy Hour
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Doubles prize money from trainer battles.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Heal Bell
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Heals the user's party's status conditions.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Heal Block
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Prevents the opponent from restoring HP for 5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Heal Order
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User recovers half its max HP.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Heal Pulse
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Restores half the target's max HP.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Healing Wish
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The user faints and the next Pokémon released is fully healed.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Heart Swap
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Stat changes are swapped with the opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Heat Crash
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The heavier the user, the stronger the attack.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Heavy Slam
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The heavier the user, the stronger the attack.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Helping Hand
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: In Double Battles, boosts the power of the partner's move.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Hex
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Inflicts more damage if the target has a status condition.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Hidden Power
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Type and power depends on user's IVs.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: High Jump Kick
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: If it misses, the user loses half their HP.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Hold Back
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Always leaves opponent with at least 1 HP.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Hold Hands
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Makes the user and an ally very happy.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Horn Leech
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Hyperspace Fury
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Lowers user's Defense. Can strike through Protect/Detect.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Ice Ball
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Doubles in power each turn for 5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Ice Burn
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May burn opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Ice Fang
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: May cause flinching and/or freeze opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Imprison
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Opponent is unable to use moves that the user also knows.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Infestation
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Ingrain
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User restores HP each turn. User cannot escape/switch.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Judgment
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Type depends on the Arceus Plate being held.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Jump Kick
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: If it misses, the user loses half their HP.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: King's Shield
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Protects against attacks, and lowers opponent's Attack on contact.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Knock Off
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Removes opponent's held item for the rest of the battle.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Last Resort
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Can only be used after all other moves are used.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Leech Life
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Leech Seed
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User steals HP from opponent each turn.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Light Screen
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Halves damage from Special attacks for 5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Lock-On
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The next move the user uses is guaranteed to hit.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Low Kick
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The heavier the opponent, the stronger the attack.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Lucky Chant
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Opponent cannot land critical hits for 5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Lunar Dance
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The user faints but the next Pokémon released is fully healed.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Magic Coat
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Reflects moves that cause status conditions back to the attacker.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Magic Room
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Suppresses the effects of held items for five turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Magma Storm
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Magnet Rise
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User becomes immune to Ground-type moves for 5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Magnetic Flux
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Raises Defense and Sp. Defense of Plus/Minus Pokémon.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Me First
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User copies the opponent's attack with 1.5× power.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Mega Drain
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Memento
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User faints, sharply lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Metal Burst
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Deals damage equal to 1.5x opponent's attack.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Metronome
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User performs any move in the game at random.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Milk Drink
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User recovers half its max HP.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Mind Reader
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User's next attack is guaranteed to hit.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Miracle Eye
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, removes Dark's Psychic immunity.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Mirror Coat
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: When hit by a Special Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Mirror Move
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User performs the opponent's last move.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Mist
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User's stats cannot be changed for a period of time.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Misty Terrain
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Protects the field from status conditions for 5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Moonlight
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Morning Sun
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Mud Sport
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Weakens the power of Electric-type moves.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Natural Gift
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Power and type depend on the user's held berry.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Nature Power
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Uses a certain move based on the current terrain.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Night Shade
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Nightmare
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The sleeping opponent loses 25% of its max HP each turn.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Noble Roar
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Oblivion Wing
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User recovers most of the HP inflicted on opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Odor Sleuth
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, Normal-type and Fighting-type attacks can now hit Ghosts, and Ghost-type attacks hit Normal.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Ominous Wind
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: May raise all user's stats at once.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Outrage
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Pain Split
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The user's and opponent's HP becomes the average of both.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Parabolic Charge
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Parting Shot
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack then switches out.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Pay Day
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: A small amount of money is gained after the battle resolves.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Payback
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Power doubles if the user was attacked first.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Perish Song
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Any Pokémon in play when this attack is used faints in 3 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Petal Dance
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Phantom Force
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Disappears on first turn, attacks on second. Can strike through Protect/Detect.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Pluck
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: If the opponent is holding a berry, its effect is stolen by user.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Poison Tail
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: High critical hit ratio. May poison opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Powder
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Damages Pokémon using Fire type moves.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Power Split
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Averages Attack and Special Attack with the target.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Power Swap
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User and opponent swap Attack and Special Attack.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Power Trick
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User's own Attack and Defense switch.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Protect
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User is not affected by opponent's move.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Psycho Shift
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Gives the opponent the user's status condition, if it hits.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Psyshock
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Psystrike
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Punishment
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Power increases when opponent's stats have been raised.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Pursuit
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Double power if the opponent is switching out.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Quash
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Makes the target act last this turn.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Quick Guard
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Fast moves won't damage the user or its teammates.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Quiver Dance
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Raises user's Special Attack, Special Defense and Speed.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Rage Powder
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Forces attacks to hit user, not team-mates.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Razor Wind
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. High critical hit ratio.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Recover
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User recovers half its max HP.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Recycle
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User's used hold item is restored.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Reflect
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Halves damage from Physical attacks for 5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Relic Song
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: May put the target to sleep.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Rest
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User sleeps for 2 turns, but user is fully healed.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Retaliate
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Inflicts double damage if a teammate fainted on the last turn.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Revenge
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Power increases if user was hit first.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Reversal
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Roar
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Rollout
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Doubles in power each turn for 5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Roost
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User recovers half of its max HP and loses the Flying type temporarily.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Rototiller
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Raises Attack and Special Attack of Grass-types.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Round
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Power increases if teammates use it in the same turn.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Safeguard
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The user's party is protected from status conditions.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Sand Tomb
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Secret Power
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Effects of the attack vary with the location.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Secret Sword
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Seismic Toss
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Shadow Force
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Disappears on first turn, attacks on second. Can strike through Protect/Detect.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Shell Smash
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Sharply raises user's Attack, Special Attack and Speed but lowers Defense and Special Defense.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Shift Gear
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Raises user's Attack and sharply raises Speed.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Silver Wind
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: May raise all stats of user at once.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Sketch
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Permanently copies the opponent's last move.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Skill Swap
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The user swaps Abilities with the opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Skull Bash
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Raises Defense on first turn, attacks on second.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Sky Attack
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May cause flinching.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Sky Drop
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Takes opponent into the air on first turn, drops them on second turn.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Sky Uppercut
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Hits the opponent, even during Fly.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Slack Off
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User recovers half its max HP.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Sleep Talk
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User performs one of its own moves while sleeping.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Smack Down
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Makes Flying-type Pokémon vulnerable to Ground moves.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Smelling Salts
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Power doubles if opponent is paralyzed, but cures it.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Snatch
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Steals the effects of the opponent's next move.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Snore
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Can only be used if asleep. May cause flinching.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Soak
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Changes the target's type to water.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Soft-Boiled
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User recovers half its max HP.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Solar Beam
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Charges on first turn, attacks on second.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Spikes
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Hurts opponents when they switch into battle.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Spiky Shield
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Protects user and inflicts damage on contact moves.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Spit Up
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Power depends on how many times the user performed Stockpile.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Spite
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The opponent's last move loses 2-5 PP.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Sticky Web
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Lowers opponent's Speed when switching into battle.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Stockpile
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Stores energy for use with Spit Up and Swallow.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Stored Power
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Power increases when user's stats have been raised.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Storm Throw
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Always results in a critical hit.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Struggle
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Only usable when all PP are gone. Hurts the user.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Substitute
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Uses HP to creates a decoy that takes hits.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Sucker Punch
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User attacks first, but only works if opponent is readying an attack.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Super Fang
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Always takes off half of the opponent's HP.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Swagger
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Opponent becomes confused, but its Attack is raised two stages.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Swallow
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The more times the user has performed Stockpile, the more HP is recovered.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Switcheroo
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Swaps held items with the opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Synchronoise
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Synthesis
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Taunt
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Opponent can only use moves that attack.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Techno Blast
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Type depends on the Drive being held.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Telekinesis
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Ignores opponent's Evasiveness for three turns, add Ground immunity.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Teleport
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Allows user to flee wild battles; also warps player to last PokéCenter.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Thousand Arrows
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Makes Flying-type Pokémon vulnerable to Ground moves.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Thrash
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Thunder Fang
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: May cause flinching and/or paralyze opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Torment
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Opponent cannot use the same move in a row.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Toxic Spikes
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Poisons opponents when they switch into battle.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Transform
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User takes on the form and attacks of the opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Tri Attack
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: May paralyze, burn or freeze opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Trick
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Swaps held items with the opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Trick Room
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Slower Pokémon move first in the turn for 5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Triple Kick
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Hits thrice in one turn at increasing power.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Trump Card
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The lower the PP, the higher the power.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Twineedle
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Hits twice in one turn. May poison opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Twister
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: May cause flinching. Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce with double power.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: U-turn
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User switches out immediately after attacking.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Uproar
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User attacks for 3 turns and prevents sleep.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: V-create
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Lowers user's Defense, Special Defense and Speed.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Venom Drench
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Lowers poisoned opponent's Special Attack and Speed.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Venoshock
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Inflicts double damage if the target is poisoned.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Vital Throw
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User attacks last, but ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Volt Switch
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User must switch out after attacking.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Volt Tackle
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: User receives recoil damage. May paralyze opponent.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Wake-Up Slap
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Power doubles if opponent is asleep, but wakes it up.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Water Pledge
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Added effects appear if preceded by Fire Pledge or succeeded by Grass Pledge.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Water Sport
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Water Spout
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The higher the user's HP, the higher the damage caused.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Weather Ball
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Move's power and type changes with the weather.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Whirlpool
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Whirlwind
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Wide Guard
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Protects the user's team from multi-target attacks.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Wish
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The user recovers HP in the following turn.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Wonder Room
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Swaps every Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense for 5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Work Up
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Worry Seed
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Changes the opponent's Ability to Insomnia.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Wrap
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Wring Out
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: The higher the opponent's HP, the higher the damage.

PokemonMoveDetail.Name: Yawn
PokemonMoveDetail.Effect: Puts opponent to sleep in the next turn.
